message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is my bottom line. I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value this product offers. If you're unable to meet that, I understand, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
